#110: Component dependencies also include information on how to properly configure the environment in which the component will be deployed

  1. true
  2. false

Correctness

  1. The answer is correct
  2. The answer is not correct

#11: A software architect plays the following roles in a development team:

  1. Lead the development team
  2. Plan software releases
  3. Facilitate communication among all stakeholders
  4. Train developers in the latest programming languages
  5. Track progress towards milestones and manage the project budget with customers

#129: There are multiple views over a software architecture model because:

  1. There is too much information to represent
  2. There are multiple stakeholders involved
  3. Each aspect can be modeled with a different language
  4. There are different design tools that can be used
  5. A single power-point slide is not big enough to contain all information
